g.text: Besides the functionality that was asked to be developed, (show customer's orders status)
this design will also cover the additional feature that was added by the developing team
which basically consists in checking for further detailed information about a chosen order
(such as the products it contains, and their respective information)
starts process of fetching customer's order status
for each client connected, a new thread will be created
client is now connected to the session
returns acknowledge message along with orders
shows orders' details and asks user if they want to see more details
[if user wants to check any order's details]
for each product inside the order, the respective information (price, name description)
will be fetched from the product repository
returns detailed information about the order
shows detailed information about chosen order (products)
functionality repeats until user exits the application
